S2M-413 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Local Government in Scotland Act 2003 (Ancillary Provisions) Order 2003-That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Local Government in Scotland Act 2003 (Ancillary Provisions) Order 2003 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
